thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Gibraltar Reports Q4 Sales $258.1 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Gibraltar Reports Q4 Sales $258.1 Million
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Gibraltar Industries Inc:
* GIBRALTAR REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES Q1 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.23 TO $0.28 * SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.96 TO $2.08 * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $213 MILLION TO $220 MILLION * Q4 SALES $258.1 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE MORE THAN $1.0 BILLION * SEES ‍GAAP EPS FOR FULL YEAR 2018 ARE EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $1.75 AND $1.87, OR $1.96 TO $2.08 ON AN ADJUSTED BASIS​
* QTRLY GAAP EPS OF $0.78 * ‍FOR Q1 OF 2018, COMPANY IS EXPECTING REVENUE IN RANGE OF $213 MILLION TO $220 MILLION​
* QTRLY ADJUSTED EPS OF $0.41 * ‍GAAP EPS FOR Q1 2018 ARE EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $0.20 AND $0.25, OR $0.23 TO $0.28 ON AN ADJUSTED BASIS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
